official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a credit against tax, or refund of tax, for certain Federal insurance taxes for employees who are members of religious faiths which oppose participation in such insurance.
short_title: Religious Exemptions for Social Security and Healthcare Taxes Act

summary.text:
Religious Exemptions for Social Security and Healthcare Taxes Act

This bill allows taxpayers who have a religious objection to participation in the Social Security system a credit or refund of employment taxes deducted to fund benefits under such system.
